question: if the ratio of apples to bananas is 5 to 2 and the ratio of bananas to cucumbers is 1 to 2 , what is the ratio of apples to cucumbers ?

a certain galaxy is known to comprise approximately 3 x 10 ^ 11 stars . of every 50 million of these stars , one is larger in mass than our sun . approximately how many stars in this galaxy are larger than the sun ?
how much is 65 % of 40 is greater than 4 / 5 of 25 ?
an amount at compound interest sums to rs . 17640 / - in 2 years and to rs . 19404 / - in 3 years at the same rate of interest . find the rate percentage ?

a square mirror has exactly half the area of the rectangular wall on which it is hung . if each side of the mirror is 34 inches and the width of the wall is 54 inches , what is the length of the wall , in inches ?
50 persons like apple . 7 like orange and mango dislike apple . 10 like mango and apple and dislike orange . 4 like all . how many people like apple ?
p , q and r together earn rs . 1980 in 9 days . p and r can earn rs . 600 in 5 days . q and r in 7 days can earn rs . 910 . how much amount does r can earn per day ?
a train requires 10 seconds to pass a pole while it requires 35 seconds to cross a stationary train which is 500 mtrs long . find the speed of the train .
if a = { 17 , 27 , 31 , 53 , 61 } , what is the sum of mean and median of the numbers in a ?

if x is to be chosen at random from the integers between 1 to 6 , inclusive , and y is to be chosen at random from the integers between 7 and 11 , inclusive , what is the probability that x + y will be even ?
the sale price of an article including the sales tax is rs . 616 . the rate of sales tax is 10 % . if the shopkeeper has made a profit of 12 % , then the cost price of the article is :
5 n + 2 > 12 and 7 n + 2 < 44 ; n must be between which numbers ?
what is the sum of odd integers from 25 to 85 , inclusive ?

there has been successive increases of 15 % and then 10 % in the price of gas from the previous month . by what percentage should a driver reduce gas consumption so that the expenditure does not change ?
the average age of a class of 24 students is 23 years . the average increased by 1 when the teacher ' s age also included . what is the age of the teacher ?

the probability of two events a and b are 0.25 and 0.35 respectively . the probability that both a and b occur is 0.15 . the probability that neither a nor b occur is _________
a , b , c can complete a piece of work in 16 , 6,12 days . working together , they complete the same work in how many days ?
gold is 10 times as heavy as water and copper is 5 times as heavy as water . in what ratio should these be mixed to get an alloy 9 times as heavy as water ?

a meeting has to be conducted with 5 managers . find the number of ways in which the managers may be selected from among 8 managers , if there are 2 managers who refuse to attend the meeting together .

the captain of a cricket team of 11 members is 24 years old and the wicket keeper is 7 years older . if the ages of these two are excluded , the average age of the remaining players is one year less than the average age of the whole team . what is the average age of the team ?
10 is subtracted from 50 % of a number , the result is 25 . find the number ?
the average age of 15 students of a class is 15 years . out of these , the average age of 5 students is 14 years and that of the other 9 students is 16 years . tee age of the 15 th student is ?
a vendor bought toffees at 6 for a rupee . how many for a rupee must he sell to gain 25 % ?

angelina walked 100 meters from her home to the grocery at a constant speed . she then walked 180 meters to the gym at double the speed . she spent 40 seconds less on her way from the grocery to the gym than on her way from home to the grocery . what was angelina ' s speed , in meters per second , from the grocery to the gym ?

two pipes a and b can fill a cistern in 10 and 15 minutes respectively . both fill pipes are opened together , but at the end of 3 minutes , ‘ b ’ is turned off . how much time will the cistern take to fill ?

according to the directions on the can of frozen orange juice concentrate , 1 can of concentrate is to be mixed with 3 cans of water to make orange juice . how many 12 ounces cans of the concentrate are required to prepare 360 6 ounces servings of orange juice ?
there are 9 fictions and 6 non - fictions . how many cases are there such that 2 fictions and 2 non - fictions are selected from them ?
the ratio of numbers is 5 : 6 and their h . c . f is 4 . their l . c . m is :
a number divided by 44 leaves remainder 17 what is the remainder when same number divided by 8

if a square mirror has a 20 - inch diagonal , what is the approximate perimeter q of the mirror , in inches ?
if 0.5 % of a = 85 paise , then the value of a is ?
the ages of two persons differ by 32 years . if 5 years ago , the elder one be 5 times as old as the younger one , their present ages ( in years ) are respectively
in a simultaneous throw of a pair of dice , find the probability of getting a total more than 4
set a consists of the integers from 1 to 12 , inclusive , while set b consists of the integers from 5 to 15 , inclusive . how many distinct integers do belong to the both sets at the same time ?
water boils at 212 ° f or 100 ° c and ice melts at 32 ° f or 0 ° c . if the temperature of a pot of water is 40 ° c , what is the temperature of the pot of water in ° f ?
find large number from below question the difference of two numbers is 100 . on dividing the larger number by the smaller , we get 9 as quotient and the 4 as remainder
having scored 94 runs in the 19 th inning , a cricketer increases his average score by 4 . what will be his average score after 19 innings ?
a is twice as fast as b . if b alone can do a piece of work in 24 days , in what time can a and b together complete the work ?
n is a whole number which when divided by 4 gives 3 as remainder . what will be the remainder when 2 * n is divided by 4 ?
if x > 0 , x / 50 + x / 5 is what percent of x ?

two trains leave the train station at the same time . one train , on the blue line , heads east - while the other , on the red line , heads west . if the train on the blue line averages 40 km / hr and the other train averages 40 km / hr - how long will it take for the trains to be 100 km apart ?
a fellow borrowed a certain sum of money at 5 % per annum at simple interest and in 5 years the interest amounted to rs . 2250 less than the sum lent . what was the sum lent ?
a rope of which a calf is tied is increased from 9 m to 23 m , how much additional grassy ground shall it graze ?
a is two years older than b who is twice as old as c . if the total of the ages of a , b and c be 27 , then how old is b ?

a vessel of capacity 90 litres is fully filled with pure milk . nine litres of milk is removed from the vessel and replaced with water . nine litres of the solution thus formed is removed and replaced with water . find the quantity of pure milk in the final milk solution ?

a train travels from albany to syracuse , a distance of 120 miles , at the average rate of 40 miles per hour . the train then travels back to albany from syracuse . the total travelling time of the train is 5 hours and 24 minutes . what was the average rate of speed of the train on the return trip to albany ?

the jogging track in a sports complex is 1000 meters in circumference . deepak and his wife start from the same point and walk in opposite directions at 20 km / hr and 12 km / hr respectively . they will meet for the first time in ?
